plugin.name: Jujutsu VCS Integration
plugin.description:
Native integration with Jujutsu (jj) version control system.
Features: - JJ-native workflow tool window (left side) - Describe-first workflow support - Continuous commit workflow - Working copy status and diffs - Commands: jj describe, jj new
plugin.change-notes:
0.1.0-SNAPSHOT

  • Initial release
  • Basic Jujutsu VCS integration
  • Describe-first workflow support
